projects.new.page.title: New Project
projects.edit.form.steps.step.core.title: Name
projects.edit.form.steps.step.core.descr: Let's start by giving a name to that idea you have...
It's time to start giving shape to that idea you have. Let's first define a name for it...
projects.edit.form.steps.step.presentati: Now let's show what this is all about...
We need people to understand what this is all about, let's share all the information they need to know...
projects.edit.form.steps.step.media.desc: Time to add some visual aids...
Media will help explain the purpose of the project in an appealing manner...
projects.edit.form.steps.step.params.des: Make the project easily discoverable for those in tune with your idea...
These will help make the project easily discoverable by those in tune with your idea...
projects.edit.form.notifications.success: Project saved successfully - Register Clubs to allow contributors join the project
